name: Enhanced MvcSiteMapProvider
tagline: An enhanced version of the ASP.NET MVC SiteMapProvider implementation for the ASP.NET MVC framework.
body:
## Getting Started

Here is the original MvcSiteMapProvider documentation. All original functionality remains.

**[MvcSiteMapProvider information](http://maartenba.github.io/MvcSiteMapProvider/getting-started.html)**

#### Congratulations, you have just installed the enhanced MvcSiteMapProvider!

The enhanced MvcSiteMapProvider now includes the ability to produce a /video-sitemap.xml (tailored video sitemap) to submit to Google. And, it includes the ability to leave the canonical URL on for the master page.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
